Last week light installation began at Siebert Field PERIOD This week the Gophers baseball schedule has been changed to reflect that PERIOD Seven games have been moved to night games this upcoming season PERIOD Two games against Penn State two games against Purdue and games against St PERIOD Thomas Augsburg and Concordia will now be played under the lights PERIOD The first night game will be held on April  against Penn State PERIOD

Minnesota begins its season Feb PERIOD  in Glendale Ariz PERIOD Its first home game will be March  against St PERIOD Johns PERIOD The full schedule can be found here PERIOD
